language.title: Russian (RU)
language.phrase: AMS Article view: Above article content
AMS Article view: Below article content
Advertising position above the article content when viewing an article.
Advertising position below the article content when viewing an article.
Adds a new article to a watched category
Mentions you in a article comment
Mentions you in a article review
Adds a new article to a watched series
AMS: Cache article management system statistics
BB code for displaying articles and series
Article comment removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Article page removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Article review removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Automatically unfeature any "featured" articles older than x days.
Use the "About me" data for the "About author" block if the "About article author" is empty
Enable 'View full article' links on multi page articles
List the file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded to articles. Use spaces or line break between extensions.
Provide the maximum article attachment file size in kilobytes (KB). Attachments over this size will be rejected.
When an article is deleted, take this action with any automatically created thread associated with the article.

Choose the layout type you want to use to display articles on ams index, category pages and other various pages with article listings. Note: Individual category pages can override this setting and use a different layout type.
The maximum number of characters that can be in an article. This includes BB code. Note: Use 0 to disable the limit.
The number of articles that will be listed per page on various pages with article listings that use the list view layout type.
The number of articles that will be listed per page on various pages with article listings that use the article view layout type.
The number of articles that will be listed per page on various pages with article listings that use the grid view layout type.
The number of articles that will be listed per page on various pages with article listings that use the tile view layout type.
Use 0 to allow an unlimited number of attachments per article. To disable article attachments, use the permissions system.
The maximum number of other articles to display from an article's author. Use 0 to disable this block.
If enabled, will automatically unfeature any featured articles that are older than x days (from the date the article was featured).
The maximum number of other articles to display from an article's category. Use 0 to disable this block.
The maximum number of characters that can be in an article comment. This includes BB code. Use 0 to disable the limit.
When enabled, will display share icons below the article.
If the "About article author" is empty, this will attempt to use the "About me" data from the members profile for the "About author" block.
Choose the display type you want to use to display featured articles on ams index, category pages and other various pages with article listings.
Controls where the collection of uploaded file attachments will be displayed
Controls where the collection of uploaded images will be displayed
Input your Google Maps Embed API Key here. Instructions on generating and retrieving your Google Maps Embed API key can be found here.

Choose the type of Home Page that you want to use for AMS.
  • Standard = Index of all articles in a filterable listing.
  • Modular = Blank page with Main and Sidebar Widget Locations

This is the number of days old that a review can be in order for it to be fetched. Reviews that are older than the cutoff date will not be displayed. Leave this option set to 0 to bypass the cut off date.
Users that do not have the permission to view full articles will only see this number of characters of the article. Note: This setting also applies to Article view layout.
When viewing various pages with article listings, this will be the default sort order that is set.
Controls how the location data will be displayed when viewing an article
Enter a meta description for your Article Management System Home Page. This will be placed inside the meta description tag on the AMS Index page, so avoid using HTML.
If a review is entered, it will not be accepted unless it is at least this long. If a review is not required, this setting will be ignored if no review is entered.
The style selected here will be displayed on all ams pages instead of the default style.
The maximum number of recent reviews to display on the main article view page. Note: Use 0 to disable this block.
The maximum number of characters that can be in an article review. This includes BB code. Use 0 to disable the limit.
If enabled, the title filter will be enabled on the series list page
The number of series parts that will be listed per page on a series page.
The number of series that will be listed per page on series index and other various pages with series listings.
If enabled, the ave rating filter will be enabled on article listing pages
If enabled, the title filter will be enabled on article listing pages
When enabled, signatures will display on comments just like they do on posts.
The number of characters of the article preview to display on the article view layout type.
The number of characters of the article preview to display on the list view layout type.
If enabled, the count of unread articles will display above the "Articles" navigation tab.
When enabled, will add "View full article" links to various navigation elements on a multi page article, allowing the viewing user to view the full article on a single page.
Options that control the article management system add-on.
Ban users from posting comments/ratings on an article
Time limit on editing/deleting own articles (minutes)
Time limit on editing/deleting own comments (minutes)
Time limit on editing/deleting own reviews (minutes)
Lock / unlock comments for own article
Lock / unlock ratings for own article
Manage tags by others in own article
Reply to reviews for own articles
Displays the specified poll in a widget.
Displays various article management system statistics
Displays the article management system category navigation
Displays featured articles from the article management system
Displays the latest article management system articles
Displays the latest article management system comments
AMS series index: Above series list
A position inside the main content area of the ams category page above the articles list.
Displays inside the sidebar on the ams category pages. Widget templates rendered in this position can use the current category entity in the {$context.category} param.
Displays inside the side navigation on the ams category pages. Widget templates rendered in this position can use the current category entity in the {$context.category} param.
A position inside the main content area of the ams index page above the articles list.
Displays inside the sidebar on the ams index page.
Displays inside the side navigation on the ams index page.
Displays inside the main column on the ams modular index page, so can support larger widgets.
Displays inside the sidebar on the ams modular index page.
A position inside the main content area of the ams series index page above the series list.
Displays inside the sidebar on the ams series index page.
This information will display in the "About author" block on articles that you create.
If no categories are explicitly selected, this widget will pull from all categories unless used within an AMS category. In this case, the content will be limited to that category and descendents.
All comments and reviews from the other articles will be merged into this article.
When enabled, users will have the option to leave an anonymous review.
This option allows Articles to be created in this category. Disabling this option does not prevent existing articles from being moved into this category.
When enabled, this option allows the article author to set an author rating when creating or editing the article. This rating is separate from user ratings.

This option allows comments for articles in this category. This option can be enabled/disabled at any time and only effects articles within this specific category. Important note: Comment Permissions determin whether or not the viewing user can view/post comments.

When this option is enabled, a location field will be available on the article create/edit form. This location field will be used to display a link in the header or Information sidebar block that when clicked on will open up a Google map to the location.
This option allows authors to add original source data to their articles
When this option is enabled, a poll can be added to articles within this category.
When enabled, users will be able to input pros and cons when submitting a review for an article.
When enabled, users with the appropriate permissions will be able to rate and or review articles within this category.
The articles you have selected are located in more than one category. Each article will only be updated if the chosen prefix is valid in its category.
This thread is for the general discussion of the {term} [url={article_link}][plain]{title}[/plain][/url]. Please add to the discussion here.
{articleTitle} posted in article category {categoryTitle}
The article {title} was reassigned to you.
A full size view, displaying articles in a grid container.
This action will associate an existing discussion thread with this article.
Automatically post in the article thread on article deletion
Add a specific URL that you want the block title to link to. Leaving this blank will link to "New Articles"
Can not change date into the future.
Can not set comment date older than the article publish date.
Can not set review date older than the article publish date
You can not update your rating or review once the author has responded.
A full size view, displaying articles in a carousel style slider.

This content is optional and is used to display custom content on the first page of a category before the listing of articles.

You may use HTML. The text (or HTML) you insert here must be valid within a <p> tag.
The type of content being published for this category, eg Poem, Guide, Book, How To, Owners Manual, Interview etc etc etc. Note: If you leave this blank, the generic term "Article" will be used.
This title is optional and will be used to generate a Title bar for the category content. If you leave the title blank, the category content will not have a title bar.
Category does not allow new articles to be added.
Comment on article {articleTitle} by {userName}
A comment on the article {title} was reassigned to you.
When enabled, registered users or guests with appropriate permissions may comment on this article.
When enabled, allows other members of the community to add their own article(s) to this series.
You may specify an article prefix to be automatically selected when visitors create new articles in this category. The selected prefix must also be selected in the 'Available prefixes' list above.
When enabled, will display the about author block below the article. You must have the about author data entered via your user account (Account details >> About Author)
Display as map below article (requires API Key)
Display as map in own tab (requires API Key)
Display as map in sidebar block (requires API Key)
When enabled, will display the cover image (if set), above the article.
When enabled, this field will be displayed with the article information on various article listing pages
Display as link in article information block
You do not have permission to view the full content of this article.
You do not have permission to view the full content of this {term}.
This page is currently in draft and not visible publicly.
Existing discussion thread is already associated with another piece of content.
Explain why you're giving this rating. Reviews which are not constructive may be removed without notice.
A full size view, displaying featured articles in a carousel style slider.
A full size view, displaying featured articles in a grid container.
A full size view, displaying as a standard article list.
When enabled, the title of the field will not be displayed on the article, only the field content.
If selected, whenever an article in this category is created, a thread will be posted in this forum.
If selected, only staff will be able to see who wrote this review.
If selected, a post will be made automatically on the creator's behalf explaining that the article is no longer available.
If selected, users will be required to select a prefix when creating or editing an article. This will not be enforced for moderators.

This is the number of days old that a article can be in order for it to be fetched. Articles that are older than the cutoff date will not be fetch. Leave this option set to 0 to bypass the cut off date.
Specify the maximum number of article comments that should be shown in this widget.

This is the number of days old that a review can be in order for it to be fetched. Reviews that are older than the cutoff date will not be displayed. Leave this option set to 0 to bypass the cut off date.
Specify the maximum number of reviews that should be shown in this widget.

Enter the address of the location associated with your article if you wish to link to a google map.
eg 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043
Members who have reacted to comment by {user}
Members who have reacted to review by {user}
This allows you to require users to enter at least this many tags when adding articles or editing tags on existing articles.
If the selected articles(s) have any prefixes applied which are not valid in the selected category, those prefixes will be removed.
The new article discussion thread must be a standard discussion thread.
The new owner must be able to view this article.
No article could be found with the ID {article_id}.
No article ID could be found from that URL.
No articles have been added to this series yet.
No articles have been added yet.
No articles have been created yet.
No articles have been featured yet
No prefixes are available for the specified categories.
No reviews have been left recently.
No series have been added yet.
No series have been created yet.
Note that the article author will see this alert even if they can no longer view their article.
Notify article author of this action
Notify the current and new owners of this action.
Notify members watching the destination category
Only display within selected categories (rather than including child categories)
Admin, edit the phrase 'xa_ams_original_source_explain' to remove this text and add your own text explanation on how to use the original source fields.
Override the ams option 'Article list default sort order'
This option allows you to override the ams option 'Article list default sort order' and set a different article list default sort order for this category.
Override ams option 'Article list layout type'
This option allows you to override the ams optoin 'Article list layout type' and set a different article list layout type for this category.
This optional setting is used to add indents to page titles in the multi page navigation (to simulate hierarchy)
This optional title is for use with the multipage pagination function where a short version of the title is more appropriate. Leave this blank to use the full page title.
Please confirm that you want to associate an existing discussion thread with this article.
Please confirm that you want to lock comments on
Please confirm that you want to lock ratings on
Please confirm that you want to unassociate discussion thread from this article.
Please confirm that you want to unlock comments on
Please confirm that you want to unlock ratings on
Please provide a review with your rating.
Send Alerts and Emails to members that are watching this article. If unchecked, will save as a Silent Edit.
The prefix will only be applied if it is valid for the category the article is in or is being moved to.

Provide a brief summary of your article for search engines.

A meta description can influence the decision of the searcher as to whether they want to click through on your article from search results or not. The more descriptive, attractive and relevant the description, the more likely someone will click through.

Provide a very brief description of your article.

Note: Leave this blank to use a snippet from the article as the description.
When enabled, registered users with appropriate permissions may rate/review this article.
The requested article is already associated with a series.
The requested article could not be found.
When this option is enabled, an image attachment must be uploaded in order for the article to be created.

Enabling this will require the the original source fields to be filled in when creating or editing an article in this category. Important Note: An article moved into the category will not be required to have this data filled in, however, the next time the article is edited, the data will need to be filled in or the article can not be saved.
When enabled, users must submit a review when rating an article.
Review on article {articleTitle} by {userName}
A review on the article {title} was reassigned to you.

Select the article that you want to add as a series part within this series. This will associate the article with this series.

Note: If the article that you are wanting to associate with this series is not listed above, you can attempt to associate a specific article by using the "Set article id" option below.
Select the category into which new articles created from this feed will be posted.

The display order determines the order in which the series parts for this series will appear on the series page as well as determines the order in which the series part titles will appear within the series table of contents on article pages.

Tip: Using increments of 10 or 100 when setting the display order allow you add a new series part between existing series parts without having to adjust display orders of multiple existing series parts.

This title needs to be a shortened version of the article title. The series part title is primarily used for the series table of contents.

Example: "Part 1: Configuration" or "System Configuration" vs "Configuring the XBS 201F7 for advanced video and sound captures"
The series {title} was reassigned to you.

Set the ID of the article that you want to add as a series part within this series. This will associate the article with this series.

Important Note: Only staff members can add another member's article to a series.
Select the sort order to fetch articles by for this widget
The specified article does not have a poll attached to it.
There are more comments to display.
There are no articles matching your filters.
There are no comments to display.
There are no series matching your filters
This article is in the series {title}
This user will still be able to view this article, but will not be able to comment or rate until the ban expires.
Enter the thread id of an existing discussion thread.
This option allows you to set a trimmed article length for the article view layout in which a "view more" link will appear. NOTE leave set to 0 to display the full article.
This action will unassociate the discussion thread from this article.
Update thread title on article deletion
AMS: User has added at least X articles
AMS: User has added no more than X articles
AMS: User has at least X articles currently featured
AMS: User has created at least X series
AMS: User has no more than X articles currently featured:
AMS: User has posted at least X comments
AMS: User has posted at least X reviews
AMS: User has posted no more than X comments
AMS: User has posted no more than X reviews
{author} commented on an article you are watching at {board_title}.

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the article "{article}" at {board} with email notification of new comments and reviews.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this article or disable all emails.
{author} posted a review on an article you are watching at {board_title}.
{author} added an article to a category you are watching at {board}.

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the category "{category}" at {board} with email notification of new articles.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this category or disable all emails.
{author} added an article to a series you are watching at {board}.

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the series "{series}" at {board} with email notification of new articles.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this series or disable all emails.
{username} added the article {article} to the series {series}.
{name} has not added any articles which matches your filters.
{user} mentioned you in a comment on article {article}.
{user} mentioned you in a review on article {article}.
{username} posted a comment on the article {title}.
{user} quoted your comment on the article {article}.
{user} reacted to an anonymous review on the article {article} with {reaction}.
{user} reacted to your comment on article {article} with {reaction}.
{user} reacted to your review on the article {article} with {reaction}.
{user} reacted to {author}'s comment on article {article} with {reaction}.
{user} reacted to {author}'s review on article {article} with {reaction}.
{name} replied to your review of the article {title}.
You are no longer able to post comments on or rate the article {title}.

You do not have any recent existing articles that are able to be associated with this series.

Use the "Set article id" option below to attempt to associate an article manually.
You do not have permission to add this article to this series.
You have already rated this article. Re-rating it will remove your existing rating or review.
You have no unread articles. You may view all latest articles instead.
You have no unread comments. You may read all latest comments instead.
You have not added any articles which matches your filters.
You have not posted any articles yet.
You must select a recent article or set an article id
You must upload at least 1 image attachment.
You are not watching any articles.
You are not watching any series.
Are you sure you want to apply a prefix to {total} article(s)?
Are you sure you want to delete this rating?
Are you sure you want to delete this review response?
Are you sure you want to delete {total} article(s)?
Are you sure you want to delete {total} comment(s)?
Are you sure you want to delete {total} review(s)?
Are you sure you want to mark all articles read?
Are you sure you want to mark this category read?
Are you sure you want to merge {count} articles?
Are you sure you want to merge {count} comments together?
Are you sure you want to move {total} article(s)?
Are you sure you want to reassign {total} article(s)?
Are you sure you want to remove this article from the series?
Are you sure you want to stop watching all articles?
Are you sure you want to unwatch this article?
Are you sure you want to unwatch this series?
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for all articles?
You will be unable to post comments on or rate the article {title} until {expiry}.
Your article {title} was merged into the article {target}.
Your article {title} was moved to a different category.
Your comment on the article {title} was deleted.
Your comment on the article {title} was edited.
Your comment on the article {title} was reassigned to {to}.
Your comments in the article {source} were merged together.
Your review must be at least {min} characters.
Your review on the article {title} was edited.
Your review on the article {title} was reassigned to {to}.
Your review on article {title} was deleted.
